Desc.entry: A multi-agency forum that promotes policies and action to address the needs of asylum seekers and refugees in the city. Provides an opportunity for organisations working in this area to exchange information. Oversees and co-ordinates the implementation of the Sheffield Refugee Integration Strategy and monitors progress. Promotes greater awareness of issues facing asylum seekers and refugees among the wider population.

Langs.entry: Interpreters can be booked if advanced notice is given (minimum of two weeks)

Pubs.entry: New Lives, Sheffield's Refugee Integration Strategy
